corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

sentence.text: The earth shook again .
Close beside them an older coolie , stretched full-length on the earth , was shaking and moaning uncontrollably with malarial fever .
Dimity covered her face with her hands and her thin shoulders shook .
The first day on the set he was hung-over and very vulnerable , and his hands were shaking .
His hands shook , but he clenched them to control their trembling .
LÃ©onie 's knees shook .
My heart was racing and my knees shook uncontrollably .
She was shaking violently and leant against the door for support .
He was shaking from the shock of the recoil of the gun , which had sent him flying backwards .
WARRINGTON General Hospital consultant Barry Taylor shook with emotion as he described the savage injuries of the bomb wounded .
He shook during the interviews and said he had a history of mental illness .
Carradine was shaking , holding onto my desk with both hands to keep steady .
Her shoulders shook convulsively and she rolled to her side on the bed , curling up .
When your outer thigh starts to shake or hurt , stop .
Becky continued shaking as she began to speak again .
6:50 a.m. CAROLG : I was just sitting down to meet with some new therapy clients , a couple , and the building started shaking like crazy .
This building shook like hell and it kept getting stronger .
This time , it just got stronger and then the building started shaking violently up and down as though it were a child 's toy block that was being tossed .
My back is still in knots and my hands are still shaking .
I think a few of the aftershocks might just be my body shaking .
